daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: A power outage affecting over 2,000 residents in Brooklyn due to melting snow coincides with ongoing deep freeze conditions, while NYC faces healthcare staffing shortages prompting a disaster emergency declaration, and new leadership at Rikers aims to address systemic dysfunction.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- Power outage affects over two thousand residents in Park Slope and Boerum Hill due to melting snow and salt. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Residents without power should follow safety tips to stay warm during the ongoing deep freeze. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Firefighters rescued two individuals from a 4-alarm fire in a Bronx apartment building. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
items: - Power outage for over two thousand in Park Slope and Boerum Hill, Brooklyn due to melting snow, salt - ABC7 New York - ABC7 New York (source: ABC7 New York, Tue, 03 Feb 2026 03:37:58 GMT)

community.title: Community
